name: Plouto
introduce: Plouto is an open and aggregate asset management platform that helps investors obtain excess investment profits with decentralized DeFi investment strategies. When the investor deposits, the protocol of Plouto will allocate the funds to the safe, reliable and profitable DeFi protocol, and a proof of equity called pToken will be generated to the investor. The investors can redeem the original deposited token and the corresponding income through pToken.
